title: Episode 402 - Special Guests The Sklar Brothers
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Jarred Taylor, Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by the Sklar Brothers. The guys discuss their favorite sports films, Richard Simmons' whispy hair messing up the Wifi in the First Class lounge, and Ross calls Steven Seagal live on air.
itunes:summary:
Jarred Taylor, Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by the Sklar Brothers. The guys discuss their favorite sports films, Richard Simmons' whispy hair messing up the Wifi in the First Class lounge, and Ross calls Steven Seagal live on air.
